configdata.Program: CREATE PROCEDURE PriceListValidate @pricelist NVARCHAR(255),@resolved_pricelist INTEGER AS if (NOT @pricelist IS NULL AND (upper(CAST(@pricelist AS VARCHAR)) <> 'NONE' AND @resolved_pricelist IS NULL)) RAISERROR ('Pricelist <' + CAST(@pricelist AS VARCHAR) + '> not found in product catalog.')
